title: CommandRejectReason (Enum)
text:
TYPE CommandRejectReason :
Reason to reject a command tried on a CommandablePoint.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: NotSupported
rows.Comment:
Executing the command was not accepted because control
operations are not supported for this point.

rows.Name: Local
rows.Comment:
Executing the command was not accepted because Local/Remote
switch is in Local Position.

rows.Name: NotAuthorized
rows.Comment:
Executing the command was not accepted because of
insufficient authorization.

rows.Name: AutoInhibit
rows.Comment:
Executing the command was not accepted because it was
prevented or inhibited by a local automation process.
